example.text: The Child Deportation Act would enact some of the most cruel & failed border policies of the Trump Admin. It demonizes immigrants, including vulnerable children, while racking up a $6 billion bill for the American people. I voted NO.

Great spending time with the Main Street Alliance today! We discussed ways we can partner to tackle the issues impacting folks in #MI11: increasing capital for small businesses, tax fairness, and paid leave. [[url]]

Legislative efforts to overturn [[user]]’ student debt relief programs are just more calloused attempts to block millions of workers and families from relief. That’s why in today’s [[user]] markup, I voted to protect the 107,600 borrowers in #MI11.

Paul Whelan, the Novi resident in his fifth year in a Russian prison, the canary in the coal mine for the lawlessness that Putin has pursued on a global scale with this unbelievably outrageous, illegal, ongoing war in Ukraine. Russia isn't China.

Democrats have a better plan. [[user]]’ budget reduces deficits by another $3 trillion over the next decade. We want to invest in America – lowering costs & creating better-paying jobs – while ensuring billionaires and big corporations pay their fair share. [[url]]

Mr. Speaker, as a nation founded on the principles of freedom and democracy, the United States celebrates the expression of these values by the people of Bangladesh as they continue to work towards a more peaceful, prosperous, and inclusive society. It is our hope that our two nations continue to grow our friendship and support each other in our mutual aspiration for a brighter future.

Legislative efforts to overturn [[user]]’ student debt relief programs are just more calloused attempts to block millions of workers and families from relief. That’s why in today’s [[user]] markup, I voted to protect the 107,600 borrowers in #MI11.
